Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics https://www.engadget.com/ Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics en-US版权所有雅虎 2023 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 16:00:41 +0000雅虎 http://yahoo.com The best docking stations for laptops in 2023

您的新笔记本电脑的端口很可能比您想要的要少。多年来，公司一直优先考虑轻薄，而忽视了连接选项。扩展坞通过将显示器、以太网、USB 和其他端口组合到一个包中，让您恢复一些多功能性，甚至更多。与简单的 USB 集线器不同，扩展坞往往有更多插槽，并且通常包含直流电源，这使得它们比小型集线器更大且便携性差得多。但这也意味着它们可以成为为您的家庭办公室设置提供支持的各种连接矩阵。最终，哪种扩展坞最适合您取决于您​​需要连接的内容，但可以肯定地说，种类繁多的选择可能会让人不知所措。我们测试了 12 个我们信任的品牌的选择，看看哪些值得您花钱。

在扩展坞中寻找什么

首先也是最重要的，考虑您需要插入什么。这可能是您实际购买扩展坞时的决定因素。您是否需要三个屏幕来扩展工作视图？从 SD 卡上传照片的快速方法？您是否希望插入网络摄像头、麦克风和流媒体灯，同时利用更快的以太网连接？一旦您确定了所需的端口类型，您可能还需要考虑这些端口的生成；即使具有相同形状的端口也可以具有不同的功能。以下是不同坞站提供的连接性的简要概述。

监控端口

外部显示器通常需要以下三个端口之一来连接到 PC：HDMI、DisplayPort 或 USB-C。 HDMI 连接比 DisplayPort 更常见，并且使用它们的电缆和设备有时更便宜。最流行的 DisplayPort 接口版本 (v1.4) 可以处理比最常见的 HDMI 版本 (2.0) 更高的分辨率和刷新率。我们在此推荐的所有带有 HDMI 插座的扩展坞均使用 2.0 版本，该版本可以处理 60Hz 的 4K 分辨率或高达 240Hz 的 1080p。支持 DisplayPort 的坞站支持版本 1.2（允许 60Hz 的 4K 分辨率）或版本 1.4（可以处理 60Hz 的 8K 或 120Hz 的 4K）。

您还可以使用扩展坞的下游（非主机）Thunderbolt 端口来连接显示器。如果您的外接显示器有 USB-C 插座，则可以直接连接。如果您有仅 HDMI 或 DisplayPort 的显示器，则可以使用具有每种类型连接器之一的适配器或转换电缆。

当然，您可以连接的显示器数量以及它们将达到的分辨率/速率取决于您计算机的 GPU 和显示器 - 并且插入的显示器越多也会降低这些数字。请务必使用支持您所需带宽的电缆。 MacOS 用户应记住，配备标准 M1 芯片的 MacBook Air 仅支持一台外接显示器。 M2 MacBook（较新的 Airs 和 13 英寸 Pro）可以处理两个外部显示器，但每个显示器都需要自己的板载端口（即，插入单个端口的扩展坞无法为两个显示器供电）。 M2 Pro 和 M2 Max Mac 可以通过单个端口运行多个显示器。

USB端口

大多数扩展坞都提供一些 USB A 型端口，非常适合有线鼠标和键盘、总线供电的环形灯和闪存驱动器等外围设备。为了以更快的速度向闪存驱动器传输数据，请使用标记为 3.1 或 3.2 的 USB-A 插槽，或者更好的是，使用 USB-C Thunderbolt 端口。

Type-C USB 端口有多种不同的类型。 Thunderbolt 3、4 和 USB4 协议是更新、功能更强大的规范，支持高达 100W 的功率传输、多个 4K 显示器以及高达 40Gbps 的数据传输速度。其他 USB-C 端口有多种版本，有些支持视频、数据和电源，有些只能管理数据和电源。传输速率和瓦数可能因端口而异，但大多数扩展坞都会在扩展坞本身或产品页面上列出瓦数或 GB/s。同样，实现最快的速度将取决于您使用的电缆和您要传输数据的设备等因素。

如今，几乎所有可用的扩展坞都通过 USB-C（通常是 Thunderbolt）连接到计算机，并且这些主机端口几乎总是标有笔记本电脑图标。它们还可以为您的笔记本电脑供电：可用瓦数各不相同，但大多数扩展坞的额定功率在 85 至 100 瓦之间。这应该足以让大多数计算机保持供电，这也意味着您无需占用额外的笔记本电脑连接器来充电。

其他港口

我们目前推荐的笔记本电脑均不包含以太网插孔；扩展坞是恢复连接的好方法。我们都客观地知道有线互联网比 Wi-Fi 更快，但可能需要运行基本的速度比较测试才能真正了解它。作为参考，在 Wi-Fi 上，我的下载速度约为每秒 45 兆位。通过以太网，速度为 925 Mbps。如果您购买了高速套餐，但只进行无线连接，那么您可能会浪费大量带宽。我测试的每个扩展坞都包含一个以太网端口，它可能是您最终最常用的连接器。

只有两台我们最喜欢的笔记本电脑具有 SD 卡读卡器，如果您需要一种快速方式从相机或录音机上传文件，您可能需要一个带有其中一个插槽的扩展坞。在我们测试的扩展坞中，大约一半有 SD 读卡器。目前，大多数（但不是全部）笔记本电脑仍然包含 3.5 毫米音频插孔，但如果您更喜欢有线耳机并希望有一个更方便的位置来插入它们，许多扩展坞都会提供。

当您计算新坞站的端口数时，请记住，大多数公司都将主机端口（连接到计算机的端口）包含在总数中。因此，如果您正在寻找具有三个 Thunderbolt 连接的扩展坞，请务必检查其中一个是否用于插入您的笔记本电脑。

设计

大多数扩展坞都采用平放或直立设计。大多数坞站将更“永久”的连接放在后面，例如以太网、直流电源、显示器连接和一些 USB。前置 USB 端口可用于闪存驱动器传输，甚至可插入手机充电（只需确保端口能够提供您所需的电力）。背面的 USB 最适合连接键盘、鼠标、网络摄像头和其他您可能经常使用的设备。有些扩展坞将主机端口放在前面，这样当您返回办公桌时可以更轻松地插入笔记本电脑，但主机端口在后面可能看起来更整洁。

我们如何测试

我们首先查看了在线评论、各个品牌的规格表以及我们的其他技术网站所涵盖的扩展坞。我们考虑了我们之前测试过并且喜欢的品牌，并淘汰了任何不具备我们认为的现代连接套件的产品（例如没有下游 USB-C 端口的扩展坞）。我们将范围缩小到 12 个竞争者，并在 M1 MacBook Pro、 Dell XPS 13 Plus和Acer Chromebook Spin 514上测试了每个扩展坞。我插入并评估了 12 种不同外围设备的连接质量，包括 4K 和高清显示器、4K 和高清网络摄像头，以及鼠标、键盘、流媒体灯和麦克风等 USB 设备。我插入有线耳机，并将数据传输到 USB-C 闪存驱动器和外部 SSD。我对以太网连接以及文件传输进行了基本速度测试。我判断了扩展坞的易用性以及我之前描述的各种设计因素。我制作了电子表格，并且在我的工作区域周围蜿蜒了足够多的电线，以至于我的猫在我的办公桌上呆了三个星期（新纪录）。

最适合 MacBook：Satechi Dual Dock Stand

Satechi 双坞站支架与我们测试的所有其他坞站有两个不同之处：它不需要电源，并且位于 MacBook 下方而不是旁边。您几乎可以将其归类为集线器，但我认为大量的端口使其赢得了坞站地位。它还通过同时插入两个 USB-C 端口来解决某些 Mac 存在的单显示器限制。这意味着，如果您拥有配备标准 M2 芯片的 MacBook（13 英寸 MacBook Pro 或任一尺寸的 MacBook Air），您将能够将两个外部显示器插入扩展坞背面并享受扩展的视图，而不是只是一个镜像的第三个显示器。

由于双坞站无需电源即可工作，因此它比其他带有变压器盒和直流电缆的坞站更容易设置。我发现在笔记本电脑上使用 MagSafe 连接器是最有意义的，但您也可以使用非数据 USB-C 端口为扩展坞供电，它将向您的机器传递 75 瓦的功率。

我测试的 4K 和高清显示器看起来都很棒，并且在扩展模式下运行良好。有两个用于网络摄像头和麦克风的 USB-C，再加上两个可用于适配器鼠标和流媒体灯的 USB-A——这可能足以用于会议甚至基本的视频创建器设置。该扩展坞最终受到以下事实的限制：所有 USB-C 连接均不是 Thunderbolt，并且只有两个 USB-A 插槽可供使用。但它是提高生产力的绝佳选择，它可以隐藏在 MacBook 下方，将电线整齐地移至机器背面，不碍事。

Satechi 双底座支架规格

  • 主机连接：2 个 USB-C

  • 主机供电功率：75W (USB-C)

  • USB-C：1 个 USB 3.0、1 个 3.1

  • USB-A：2

  • 显示器：2 个 HDMI 2.0、1 个 DisplayPort 1.4

  • 辅助 3.5 毫米：无

  • SD卡：无

最佳 Thunderbolt 4 扩展坞：Kensington AD2010T4

对于那些想要最新 Thunderbolt 接口的额外速度和连接性的人，我推荐Kensington 的 AD2010T4 Thunderbolt 4 双 4K 扩展坞。在所有测试的 TB4 扩展坞中，AD2010 是唯一一个低于 300 美元的扩展坞，但它的性能与我测试的其他一些扩展坞相当，甚至提供了更好的端口选择。它为您提供两个 Thunderbolt 4 连接，一个用于主机，一个用于配件，以及一个额外的 3.2 USB-C。双 HDMI 2.0 插座可以处理两个分辨率高达 4K（60Hz）的外部屏幕。但如果您需要三个额外的显示器或拥有 8K 屏幕，则可以利用 Thunderbolt 端口。

总共有四个 USB-A，足以容纳有线鼠标或键盘以及其他一些外围设备。它有一个 SD 和一个 microSD 卡插槽、一个 3.5 毫米音频组合插孔和一个以太网插孔。甚至还有两个 Kensington 锁槽，可让您通过电缆以物理方式固定坞站。

该设备本身具有坚固的感觉和有吸引力的金属设计。我唯一的抱怨是平放方向，并且近一半的端口位于前边缘 - 我认为将大多数连接保持在后面的直立底座在桌子上整体看起来更整洁。不过，我应该指出，肯辛顿 (Kensington) 出售其码头支架，这有助于美观。

肯辛顿 AD2010T4 规格

  • 主机连接：Thunderbolt 4

  • 传输至主机的最大功率：96W（直流）

  • USB-C：1 个 TB4、1 个 3.2

  • USB-A：4

  • 显示器：2 个 HDMI 2.0

  • 辅助 3.5 毫米：是

  • SD 卡：SD 和 microSD

最佳高级底座：CalDigit TS4

CalDigit 的 TS4扩展坞有很多值得欣赏的地方：它采用坚固、直立的设计，背面有一个主机连接，还有多达五个下游 USB-C 端口，其中两个是 Thunderbolt 4。一个 microSD 卡插槽以及一个耳机插孔、两个 USB-C 和一个 USB-A 连接器。背面还可以容纳四个 USB-A 设备和两个 3.5 毫米插孔，一个用于音频输入，一个用于音频输出。扩展坞可能感觉缺乏的一个领域是显示输入。它只有一个 DisplayPort 1.4，但有大量 TB4 端口，您可以轻松地使用它们来装备一个完整的命令中心（如果您没有 USB-C 显示器，有很多适配器）。

多千兆位以太网插孔可处理高达 2.5Gbps 的速度，因此，如果您要购买极速的互联网套餐，此扩展坞可以帮助您充分利用它。 TS4 可以为您的笔记本电脑提供高达 98W 的功率，但与任何扩展坞一样，当其他设备也消耗功率时，瓦数会下降。

TS4 与我的 MacBook Pro 和戴尔 XPS13 Plus 配合得同样好，甚至与 Chromebook 兼容。我通过 Thunderbolt 端口测试了三星 T7 SSD 的读/写速度，在 Mac 上获得了 734 MB/s 的读取速度和 655 MB/s 的写入速度，在 Dell 上获得了 1048/994 的读取速度。与其他扩展坞相比，对于 Mac 来说，它处于中低范围，对于 PC 来说，整体速度是最快的。在 PC 上，它还比任何其他扩展坞更快地处理 1GB 文件夹传输到闪存驱动器，并通过以太网提供最快的连接速度。这是唯一一个可以让我同时插入手头所有外围设备的装置。如果你有很多想要同时使用的技术（而且钱不是问题），那么这就是你应该得到的。

卡尔数字 TS4

  • 主机连接：Thunderbolt 4

  • 传输至主机的功率：98W（直流）

  • USB-C：2 个 TB4、3 个 3.2

  • USB-A：5

  • 显示器：1 个 DisplayPort 1.4

  • Aux 3.5mm：1 x 音频组合、1 x 音频输入、1 x 音频输出

  • SD 卡：SD 和 microSD

最适合 Chromebook：Kensington SD4780P

Kensington SD4780P Dual 4K通常需要 DisplayLink驱动程序，但 2017 年之后生产的任何 Chromebook 都支持跳转连接。找到一个适用于 ChromeOS 的扩展坞非常困难；在我测试的 12 台设备中，只有 4 台与 Acer Chromebook Spin 514 连接，而这 4 台中的一台无法运行两个显示器。 SD4780P 使用 USB-C 主机连接，通过它提供最大 100W 的功率传输，并且能够干净地运行 4K 和高清屏幕。

它允许通过五个此类端口连接各种 USB-A 外围设备，但只有一个下游 USB-C，因此我无法同时使用网络摄像头和麦克风。这意味着，如果您想要设置不止一种此类设备，则需要使用 Chromebook 的内置端口。塑料材质让它看起来有点便宜，而且我对平放设计并不感兴趣，但主机端口位于后面，这将使您的设置更加整洁。如果您想要的只是获得一些额外的显示器并使用有线 USB 配件，那么 Chromebook 是一个不错的选择。

肯辛顿 SD4780P 规格

  • 主机连接：USB-C

  • 传输至主机的功率：100W（直流）

  • USB-C：1 个 3.1

  • USB-A：5

  • 显示器：2 个 HDMI 2.0、2 个 DisplayPort 1.2

  • Aux 3.5mm：1 x 音频组合

  • SD卡：无

我们测试的其他扩展坞

可插拔TBT4-UDZ

当我从包装盒中取出可插拔 TBT4-UDZ Thunderbolt 4时，我确信它会成功：它具有实用的直立设计、有吸引力的金属表面，并且主机连接是 TB4。虽然有大量 USB-A 和显示器端口，但只有一个下游 USB-C。现代底座，尤其是售价 300 美元的底座，应该可以让你同时运行 USB-C 摄像头和麦克风等功能。否则，这是非常有限的。

安克 575 USB-C

Anker 575 USB-C 的售价为 250 美元（更常见的是 235 美元），对于 Windows 来说是一个不错的预算选择。它在戴尔 XPS 13 Plus 上表现良好，但在连接到 MacBook Pro 时，第三个屏幕、4K 网络摄像头和耳机插孔出现问题。它非常紧凑，这意味着当插入一堆电缆时它可能会摇晃，但它有很好的端口选择，并且能够很好地处理我的基本设置。

贝尔金 Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4

Belkin Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 Dock是 Thunderbolt 4 替代品的有力竞争者。它具有与 AD2010 几乎相同的端口（减去 microSD 插槽）和有吸引力的圆形设计，但价格要高出 90 美元，所以我只建议您在打折时购买它。

Acer USB Type-C 坞站

宏碁的 USB Type-C Dock D501比我们为 Chromebook 选择的 Kensington 贵 10 美元，但其性能相似，值得一提。它具有几乎相同的端口（包括相当有限的单个下游 USB-C），但以太网和数据传输速度更快。

常见问题解答

扩展坞值得吗？

如果您要插入的配件多于笔记本电脑允许的数量，那么扩展坞就值得了。假设您有 USB-C 摄像头和麦克风，以及 USB-A 鼠标、键盘和流媒体灯；很少有现代笔记本电脑有足够的连接来同时支持所有这些。扩展坞可以使该设置变得可行，同时还为您提供额外的端口（例如以太网连接），并为您的笔记本电脑供电。然而，如果您只需要一些额外的 USB 插座，那么您最好使用集线器，因为它们往往更便宜。

笔记本电脑扩展坞要多少钱？

笔记本电脑底座的价格从 150 美元到 450 美元左右不等。价格较高的设备往往拥有更多端口和更强大的连接，例如 Thunderbolt 4。

笔记本电脑可以在扩展坞上充电吗？

几乎所有扩展坞都允许您通过主机连接（从扩展坞到计算机的电缆）为笔记本电脑充电。这种功能加上更多的端口是扩展坞与集线器的区别。扩展坞可以向笔记本电脑传输 65W 到 100W 的功率，几乎所有扩展坞都配有直流适配器。

所有扩展坞都与所有笔记本电脑兼容吗？

不，并非所有扩展坞都与每台笔记本电脑兼容。在我们的测试中，Chromebook 的兼容性问题最大，戴尔 PC 的兼容性问题最少，MacBook 则介于两者之间。所有扩展坞都会在在线产品页面上列出它们所使用的品牌和型号 - 请务必检查您的笔记本电脑的代次，因为某些扩展坞无法支持某些芯片。

OpenAI 极其受欢迎的 ChatGPT 服务已关闭，对其 1 亿周活跃用户来说无法正常运行。就在美国东部时间上午 9 点之前，服务中断了。 OpenAI已承认此次中断，并表示这也影响了该公司的 API 服务。不过，该服务于东部时间上午 10:50 左右恢复。

ChatGPT 用户收到的不是工作平台，而是一条警告消息，称其“目前已满负荷”。 OpenAI 在一份错误报告中写道，它“发现了一个导致 API 和 ChatGPT 错误率较高的问题，我们正在努力修复。”总而言之，停电持续了大约两个小时。

昨晚，服务也受到了几个小时的影响，但这只是部分中断，并未影响所有用户。直到昨晚，OpenAI 的聊天机器人平台几乎没有出现任何操作问题。该服务稳步增长，毫无问题地达到了上述每周 1 亿用户的里程碑。此外，API 方面有超过 200 万开发人员。

OpenAI 一直在左右发布公告，戏弄任何人都可以创建的可定制人工智能机器人，甚至考虑制造自己的芯片来支持该服务。

更新，美国东部时间 2023 年 11 月 8 日上午 10:55：此报道已更新，包含有关 ChatGPT 恢复运行状态的信息。

(AP Photo/Richard Drew, File)OpenAI-Showcase HP Spectre Fold review: Cutting edge at all costs

这种情况很少见，但偶尔会有一家公司冒险创造出真正尖端的设备，即使其账目受到打击。这正是惠普在Spectre Fold 上所做的事情。尽管采用与去年的华硕 Zenbook 17 OLED相同的处理器，但惠普推出的柔性屏笔记本电脑比之前的任何产品都更薄、更轻、更精致。 Spectre Fold 代表了下一代混合设计的真正飞跃，以至于您甚至可能想购买一个。问题是，这个东西售价 5,000 美元，几乎会超出任何人的预算。

展示

Spectre Fold 的核心是 LG 的 17 英寸 2,560 x 1,920 OLED 面板，该面板具有充足的亮度（SDR 内容为 400 尼特，HDR 内容高达 500 尼特）和令人印象深刻的色域（DCI-P3 的 99.5%） ）。更重要的是，它的边框很薄，只有最轻微的折痕。这意味着在笔记本电脑模式下，Spectre Fold 看起来几乎与任何其他小型超便携式笔记本电脑一样，实际上具有 12.5 英寸的屏幕。但是，您可以随时拉下键盘以创建 HP 所谓的扩展模式（相当于一个半屏幕），或者将系统支撑在支架上以使用其完整的 17 英寸面板。因此，根据您的需求，您可以获得适合您的内容或工作空间的完美尺寸的显示器。作为一个看着《变形金刚》长大的孩子，一款可以打包并轻松扔进包里的便携式一体机有一种神奇的魔力。 （我还没有决定 Spectre Fold 是否更像Perceptor还是更接近像Reflector这样的机器人。）

设计

然而，惠普真正发挥其技能的地方在于 Spectre Fold 的设计。与 Zenbook 17 Fold 笨重的设计和脆弱的外围设备不同，惠普似乎考虑到了每一个细节。有一个支架可以折叠到与系统主体齐平，因此在不使用时它会消失。当关闭时，它的键盘可以整齐地安装在系统内部，而隐藏的磁性充电线圈可以使键盘和惠普附带的手写笔保持充满状态，以便它们随时可以使用。整个套件仅重 3.58 磅，厚度为 0.84 英寸（闭合时），比华硕灵活的 Zenbook（4.04 磅，1.25 英寸）明显更薄、更轻。

此外，与华硕不同的是，几乎不需要任何设置。键盘在 Spectre Fold 首次启动时会自动配对，并且其蓝牙连接非常稳定。虽然 Spectre 的两个带有 Thunderbolt 4 的 USB-C 端口乍一看可能看起来很尴尬，但将它们放在设备的相对两侧意味着无论系统处于什么模式，总有至少一个触手可及。连接性永远不会短缺，附带的加密狗增加了两个 USB-A 端口和一个 HDMI 插孔。结果是这款设备给人一种令人惊讶的精致感，尤其是当您考虑到此类笔记本电脑只存在了几年的时间时。

Spectre Fold 的一个尴尬之处在于，虽然它具有锐利的 5-MP 网络摄像头并支持 Windows Hello，但摄像头本身的方向可能会成为一个问题，具体取决于笔记本电脑所处的模式。一体化网络摄像头处于纵向模式而不是横向模式。当您将其与位于显示屏左边框上的传感器结合使用时，可能很难在保持笔记本电脑居中的同时正确定位自己。

表现

Spectre Fold 的处理器是其规格表中感觉不那么复杂的部分。只有一种配置配备英特尔酷睿 i7-1250U 芯片以及 16GB RAM 和 1TB SSD。对于如此昂贵的系统来说，这并不是很令人印象深刻，尽管惠普表示，它选择该芯片是为了确保它能够安装在 Spectre Fold 的超薄底盘（展开后仅 0.33 英寸）内。无论如何，对于一般生产力来说，这个东西已经足够快了。只是不要指望进行任何严肃的游戏或视频编辑。

电池寿命

通常，对于像这样基本上是美化概念设备的小工具，电池寿命是事后才想到的。但 Spectre Fold 的使用寿命与更传统的超便携笔记本电脑相当，这超出了人们的预期。在PCMark10的Open Office rundown测试中，它持续了10小时29分钟，仅比华硕Zenbook S13的10分39秒的时间短了10分钟。尽管那是在笔记本电脑模式下。当 17 英寸面板完全展开时，电池续航时间减少了两个小时，至 8 分 31 秒。

包起来

许多人仍然对具有柔性显示屏的设备持怀疑态度（我可能会补充说，这是有充分理由的），但 5,000 美元的 Spectre Fold 是这项技术所能提供的最好的例子。这是一款时尚的机器，适合狭窄的空间，但当您有更多的工作空间时，它也可以扩展。当您需要收拾行李离开时，它可以整齐地放入袋子中。它为您提供了随身携带便携式显示器的所有好处，但几乎没有任何缺点，同时还解决了联想和华硕之前的弯曲尝试中的几乎所有缺点。

然而，对这样的事情给出具体的分数感觉似乎没有抓住要点。当然，它非常昂贵，但惠普的目标并不是制造具有大众吸引力的产品。其使命是采用当今最先进的组件和设计原理来展示下一代混合设备的真正潜力。为此，我认为这个设备是成功的。通过 Spectre Fold，惠普制造了您可能想购买的第一款柔性屏笔记本电脑。但现在困难的部分来了：制造一个人们真正买得起的产品。

WhatsApp 中的一项新功能可让您向使用该应用拨打电话的人隐藏您的 IP 地址。了解某人的 IP 地址可能会泄露许多个人信息，例如他们的位置和互联网服务提供商，因此可以选择隐藏它是一个重大的隐私胜利。 WhatsApp 在博客文章中写道：“这项新功能为我们最注重隐私的用户提供了额外的隐私和安全层。”

目前，WhatsApp 通过自己的服务器或根据网络条件与通话对象建立称为点对点的直接连接来中继呼叫。点对点呼叫通常可以提供更好的语音质量，但要求两个设备都知道彼此的 IP 地址。

然而，一旦您开启新功能（简称为“保护通话中的 IP 地址”），WhatsApp 将始终通过自己的服务器中继您的通话，而不是建立点对点连接，即使这意味着对您的网络造成轻微影响。音质。该公司表示，所有通话将继续保持端到端加密，即使它们通过 WhatsApp 的服务器。

过去几个月，WhatsApp 不断添加更多隐私功能。六月份，该公司添加了一项功能，可以让人们自动让未知来电者静音。它还引入了“隐私检查”部分，允许用户从应用程序中的一个位置调整一系列隐私设置，今年早些时候，还添加了一项功能，可以让人们通过指纹或面部识别锁定某些聊天。

随着时间的推移，“黑色星期五”一词变得越来越用词不当。曾经的感恩节后每天的特别优惠现已成为网络零售商每月的促销活动。 2023 年，这种情况再次发生： 塔吉特(Target) 和百思买 (Best Buy)已经在宣传其早期的黑色星期五优惠；亚马逊对许多折扣进行了价格匹配，并拥有自己的“ 假日优惠”登陆页面； 沃尔玛表示将于 11 月 8 日启动第一波黑色星期五促销活动。许多其他商店和制造商也已经（或即将推出）提前促销。

一连串的促销活动可能会让人恼火，但它也提供了一个很好的机会，让您可以按照自己的节奏完成假日购物。为了提供帮助，我们收集了下面可以找到的最佳早期黑色星期五优惠。我们总有机会在 11 月 24 日获得更大的折扣，但我们已经看到LG A2 OLED 电视、 PS5 捆绑包、 第 9 代 iPad和其他我们喜欢的小工具的历史最低价。我们将在黑色星期五之前定期更新我们的列表，因此请回来查看是否还有您关注的其他内容。

Apple AirPods Pro（第二代）

最新版本的Apple AirPods Pro已在亚马逊和Target重新发售，售价为 200 美元。这比他们的历史最低价格高出约 10 美元，比平常的价格低 50 美元。由于 AirPods Pro 易于配对并与 Apple 设备深度集成，因此成为我们的 无线耳机购买指南中“最适合 iOS 的选择”。有效的主动降噪 (ANC)、出色的通透模式和令人愉悦的温暖声音轮廓也有所帮助， 新的“自适应音频”模式也可以根据周围环境调整耳机的噪音控制设置。也就是说，它们的电池续航时间只是平均每次充电六小时左右，而且你真的必须使用 iPhone 才能使用它们。去年我们给第二代 AirPods Pro 的 Lightning 版本评分为 88 分；这个新版本几乎完全相同，只是配备了USB-C 充电盒并具有更高的 IP54 防尘等级。

苹果 iPad（第 9 代）

苹果的第 9 代 iPad在亚马逊、 沃尔玛和塔吉特的售价降至 249 美元，这是我们在过去一个月的大部分时间里看到的交易，但仍与该平板电脑的最低价格相匹配。这是我们的iPad 购买指南中的预算选择，它在 2021 年获得了86 分的评分。它是最后一款使用苹果旧设计语言的 iPad，因此它有厚边框、Lightning 端口、Home 按钮和非按键。层压显示器。这个版本还配备了微不足道的 64GB 存储空间。不过，以这个价格来说，如果你想要的只是一个用于流媒体视频、玩游戏和浏览网页的大屏幕，那么它仍然很难做得更好。 Its 10.2-inch display remains a step up from cheaper slates, its A13 Bionic chip is plenty fast for casual media consumption and its battery still lasts around 10 hours per charge. Most importantly, it's the cheapest route into Apple's huge app library, customer support and years of software updates.

If you want a more modern design, the iPad Air is the top pick in our guide, and it's now on sale for $500. Be warned, though: A recent Bloomberg report says that Apple plans to launch new tablets in the spring. If you don't need an iPad right away, it's probably worth waiting.

Apple AirPods (2nd gen)

Starting on November 8, Walmart has the second-gen AirPods for only $69 — a new record low and the cheapest we've ever seen. Walmart+ members get early access to Walmart's Black Friday deals, with sales being open to everyone else a few hours later. These AirPods are a bit old at this point, but at this Black Friday price, they're a great deal for anyone who just wants a pair of earbuds that will work seamlessly with their iPhone, iPad or MacBook.

Samsung T9 SSD

The latest Samsung T9 portable SSD is on sale for $130 right now for a 1TB drive, which is the best price it's been since it came out last month. You can snag these Black Friday deals from Amazon or Samsung direct, and you'll save $40 if you spring for the 2TB version or $100 on the 4TB model. The T9 is the newest iteration of Samsung's popular portable drive that we've long been fans of, and it supports read and write speeds of up to 2,000 MB/s. It also has dynamic thermal guard to prevent overheating, plus it comes with a USB-C to C and USB-C to A cords so you can use it with a variety of devices.

PlayStation DualSense Wireless Controller

Amazon has discounted a bunch of PlayStation DualSense controllers ahead of Black Friday, including many of the colorways that typically go for $75. You can pick up Cosmic Red, Starlight Blue, Nova Pink and other models for $50 each, which is just about a record-low price. These controllers work with the PS5 as well as PC, and they sport adaptive L2 and R2 triggers, haptic feedback and a built-in mic array.

PS5 + Marvel's Spider-Man 2 bundle

If you or someone you love hasn't gotten their hands on a PS5 yet and is itching to do so, this bundle with the console and the new Spider-Man 2 game is down to its cheapest price yet — $500. The PS5 remains one of the best gaming consoles you can get right now, and when we reviewed the new Marvel's Spider-Man 2, we found it to be even better than its predecessor. In it, you can swap between playing as Peter Parker and Miles Morales, and it includes expanded combat mechanics.

Surfshark VPN

Surfshark's Black Friday deal knocks up to 86 percent off two-year plans, and you'll get a few extra months of service for free depending on the plan you select. We consider Surfshark to be one of the best VPN services available right now, particularly if you want a solid VPN at an affordable price. We believe the mid-tier plan, Surfshark One, will be the best for most people and a two-year plan is down to $2.69 per month, with an additional four months of services thrown in for free.

Samsung M80C Smart Monitor

Samsung's Smart Monitor M80C is $300 off and down to $400 right now. You'll see a $200 discount on the product page, but a clippable coupon will take the extra $100 off at checkout. The selling point for this display, and really any Samsung Smart Monitor, is that it pulls triple duty as an external display, a smart TV and an IoT hub. In addition to connecting it to your computer, you can use it standalone as a TV thanks to the built-in TV operating system and included remote, and the embedded SmartThings hub lets you directly connect things like smart lights and other gear to the display.

Motorola razr+

The Moto razr+ is 30 percent off and down to a record low of $700. It earned a spot in our best foldable phones guides thanks to handy exterior display that's actually easier to use than that on the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 and its ability to fold in half and get super compact and pocket-friendly. It's cameras are not on par with those on Samsung's foldables, but it's a generally solid flip phone with a ton of personality.

Samsung 85-inch The Frame smart TV

The 85-inch Samsung The Frame smart TV is 23 percent off and down to a new record low of $3,300 at both Amazon and Samsung direct. The Frame has been super popular thanks to its design , which mimics framed artwork when not in use. It has a matte, anti-reflective display and an included slim wall mount so you can get the true “artwork” effect when you hang it on the wall. As an actual TV, it supports 4K content and Quantum Dot technology, plus it runs on Samsung's Tizen TV operating system.

Logitech G203 gaming mouse

Amazon is having a big sale on Logitech gaming accessories and peripherals , including gaming headsets, mice, keyboards and more. Of note is the Logitech G203 Lightsync wired gaming mouse , which is half off and down to only $20. It's one of our favorite gaming mice thanks in no small part to its affordable price, but it's also fairly lightweight and sturdily built with an ambidextrous design that will work for right- and left-handed users. Also discounted is the Logitech G733 Lightspeed wireless gaming headset , which is 20 percent off and down to $120. It has an attractive design with subtle LED lighting and a stretch band, and it has a solid wireless connection with audio to match.

Solo Stove early Black Friday deal

Solo Stove's Black Friday deals have knocked up to $245 off fire pit bundles, up to $100 off fire pits by themselves and even more. A standout is the Ranger Backyard Bundle 2 , which is $145 off and down to $320. It includes the company's most compact fire pit along with its accompanying shield, stand, lid and shelter. Everything you'd need for an easy setup right out of the box is included in this bundle, and the 2.0-version of the Ranger includes a removable base plate and ash pan, both of which make the fire pit much easier to clean.

ProtonVPN early Black Friday deal

Our favorite VPN service , ProtonVPN , is having a rare sale for Black Friday that brings a monthly subscription down to only $4 for a total of 30 months. That means you'll pay $120 for two and a half years of access, which is a pretty good deal. ProtonVPN passed our tests with high marks, but what made it stand out among other VPN security services was its independently audited no-logs policy, and the fact that the company has proven they don't comply with law enforcement requests to reveal data. If you want to jump in head-first with Proton services, the company has discounted Proton Unlimited , which includes access to VPN, Mail, Calendar, Drive and Pass, to just under $9 per month for the first year.

Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K

Amazon's latest Fire TV Stick 4K and Fire TV Stick 4K Max have received their first discounts since they arrived in September . The former is $20 off at $30, while the latter is $15 off at $45. Between the two, the Max has a slightly faster processor clocked at 2.0GHz (instead of 1.7GHz), 16GB of internal storage (instead of 8GB) and support for the Wi-Fi 6E (instead of just Wi-Fi 6). It also includes Amazon's "Ambient Experience" mode, which displays artwork and widgets when the streamer is idle. That said, both dongles should be quick to load content. Both support the requisite streaming apps, Dolby Atmos and all the major HDR formats as well.

The downsides are the familiar ones with Fire TV devices: The UI is saddled with ads and not shy about nudging you toward Amazon services like Prime Video and Freevee . But if you often use those apps (or Alexa) and just want a competent 4K streamer for cheap, that may not be an issue.

On the higher end of the Fire TV lineup, the Fire TV Cube is also on sale for $110. That ties the all-time low for the streaming box/Alexa speaker hybrid. You can also pair the Fire TV Stick 4K Max with Blink's 1080p Video Doorbell for $65 total, though that offer is only available for Prime members and is only scheduled to run through November 3.

Google Nest Hub

If you're partial to the Google Assistant, Google's Nest Hub is also on sale for $60 at Target , B&H , Best Buy , Google's online store and others. That's $20 higher than its all-time low but still $40 off Google's list price. The Nest Hub is the top overall pick in our smart display buying guide, and we gave it a review score of 89 back in 2021. It has a 7-inch screen, so it's a bit bigger than the Echo Show 5 but should still be compact enough to fit neatly in a bedroom or small office. While it lacks a built-in camera, that may be a selling point for those who especially sensitive to their privacy (though no smart display is truly privacy-conscious).

Ultimately, whether it's worth getting a Nest Hub or Echo Show depends on what services you use: If you own a bunch of Nest devices and depend on apps like Gmail, Google Calendar and Google Photos, Google's display will make sense. If you want a larger model with a webcam and stronger speakers, the 10-inch Nest Hub Max is also on sale for $129. That's a $100 discount.

LG A2 OLED TV

We expect to see many more TV deals as we get closer to Black Friday, but for now one standout is LG's 48-inch A2 OLED TV on sale for a new low of $550 at Best Buy. This is an entry-level model from 2022, so it's limited to a 60Hz refresh rate, lacks HDMI 2.1 ports and doesn't support other gaming-friendly features like VRR. That said, it's still an OLED TV, so it delivers deep contrast, bold colors, wide viewing angles and low input lag. At this price, it should be a nice step-up option for smaller or secondary rooms. Just note that it can't get as bright as higher-end OLED sets, so it's best situated away from direct sunlight.

Apple MacBook Air (15-inch)

A configuration of Apple's 15-inch MacBook Air with an M2 chip, 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage is down to $1,449 at Best Buy. That's $250 less than Apple's MSRP. If you can live with less memory, a version with 8GB of RAM is on sale for $1,250 at Amazon with an on-page coupon. Either way, the MacBook Air is the top pick in our laptop buying guide , as it has just about everything we want from a mainstream notebook: A premium design, a comfortable keyboard and trackpad, a lovely display, long battery life, great speakers and solid performance. Compared to the 13-inch Air, this model has more powerful speakers alongside its larger screen. We gave it a score of 96 in our review this past June.

The MacBook Air's main downsides are that it only has two Thunderbolt ports and, as always, it's virtually impossible to upgrade after the fact. Plus, with the recent introduction of the new M3 chip , the countdown is on for a refresh. A recent Bloomberg report says that Apple plans to launch an M3-powered MacBook Air at some point in 2024, though that shouldn't make this current model obsolete if you need a new laptop right away.

FAQs

When is Black Friday 2023?

Black Friday 2023 lands on November 24 this year, with Cyber Monday 2023 following up a few days later on November 27. However, the early deals have already begun . The entire month of November might as well be renamed Holiday Shopping Month as that's when companies really start to get serious with their discounts.

What day is Black Friday 2023 at Walmart?

Walmart Black Friday deals will begin early this year on November 8. Walmart+ members will get a few hours of early access to Black Friday deals if they shop online on November 8, with access for everyone else starting later that day. Walmart will match its online Black Friday deals in stores starting November 10.

Will Amazon have a Black Friday sale in 2023?

Amazon will likely have a Black Friday sale in 2023. While the online retailer hasn't made its deals known yet like Walmart has, Amazon will almost certainly have deals across all of the types of products it sells, including electronics. We anticipate seeing record-low prices on Amazon devices in particular, like Echo speakers, Fire TVs, Kindles and more. In years past, Amazon Black Friday deals have brought some of the best prices of the year on our favorite gadgets and gear, including headphones, tablets, smartwatches, robot vacuums and more.

What other retailers have Black Friday sales in 2023?

Most retailers have Black Friday sales, so you can expect to see Target , Best Buy , and others join Walmart and Amazon in discounting inventory to capitalize on holiday shopping interest. In the consumer electronics space, we expect most companies to have some sort of Black Friday promotion, so that means you will likely be able to get big-ticket items from brands like Apple, Samsung, Google, Sony, LG, Sonos and others for much cheaper prices.

Providing read receipts has long been a choice across almost every messaging platform. Now, one of the biggest holdouts, Instagram, is finally testing a feature that lets users hide when they've "seen" a message. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg and Instagram head Adam Mosseri both announced the update on their Instagram Broadcast channels.

Mosseri also shared an image of how the feature will work. The option will live under the Privacy and Safety tab, accessible by clicking on the person's name from inside the chat. From there, a section will appear called "Who can see your activity." Just switch the toggle below and all views moving forward should then become private. However, any messages sent in vanish mode will still have read receipts.

Whether you open a message with a video and can't listen right away or just don't want to respond in the moment, there are lots of reasons why hiding your read receipts can be beneficial. However, they didn't say when the option will roll out to everyone or even how exactly they're testing it. Also unclear is if you'll have to turn it off for each person or if there will eventually be an overarching option.

Meta-owned WhatsApp has allowed users to hide their read receipts since 2014, but Messenger , like Instagram, still automatically shows when a message is viewed. Maybe one day all Meta platforms will allow for checking messages discreetly, but until then, we'll watch how the Instagram test goes.

Following a Bloomberg   report that said Rockstar Games would announce the next entry in the GTA franchise as early as this week, Rockstar confirmed it would release a trailer for the forthcoming game in early December, as part of its 25th anniversary celebration. While Rockstar has yet to launch the title, some fans may have already gotten a glimpse of early-days gameplay footage due to a leak that a hacker uploaded online in 2022. The developer later confirmed the contents of the leak and said that the game's creation would continue "as planned."

Rockstar may reveal GTA VI's release period alongside the trailer next month, but its parent company Take-Two previously hinted that it's coming out sometime in 2024.

(Photo by Jakub Porzycki/NurPhoto via Getty Images)GTA V PlayStation Game Photo Illustration Google wants to help you create new smart home automations with AI-generated scripts

Google is rolling out new features and improvements for Home and Nest, one of which could make it much easier for users to create complex home automations even if they don't know how to code. The company's experimental " help me script " feature leverages the power of generative AI to create home automation scripts from the natural language prompts users type in. They can, for instance, write "when the TV turns on after sunset, dim the living room lights and close the blinds" to instantly generate a script they can use.

"Help me script" lives inside Google Home for the web, and it appears as a panel inside the script editor when users click on "+ Add new." All they have to do is write a prompt, press enter and then copy-paste the script results into the script editor. They'll then have to validate the script to verify that it has no errors and that it's working as intended before saving it to activate the automation. Based on the other potential home automation prompts that Google listed, including "use lights and TVs to make my house look occupied when I arm the security system" and "send me a notification when the doorbell rings but nobody is home," it could be a valuable security tool. It's just a test feature at this point, though, and is only available in Public Preview on Google Home for the web for a limited time only.

In addition to the generative AI-powered script generator, Google has also announced that expanded controls for compatible smart home devices across different brands are coming to Home's Public Preview soon. The home panel, a Pixel-exclusive that gives users quick access to their smart home controls on their lock screen, is also making its way to other Android 14 devices .

(Photo by Joan Cros/NurPhoto via Getty Images)Andorid Ecosystem At Mobile World Congress Barcelona 2023 The Morning After: Hollywood studios wanted to use AI-generated likenesses of dead actors without permission

SAG-AFTRA, the union representing Hollywood performers, has reportedly responded to studios' “last, best and final” offer to end the strike, rejecting clauses letting studios re-use AI-created likenesses of high-demand and deceased performers without consent from their estate or families . “They can't have that loophole to exploit performers,” a union-side source told The Hollywood Reporter . “我们不能允许这种语言继续存在。”

Reportedly, the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers (AMPTP) would “secure AI scans” for Schedule F performers — union members earning more than $32,000 per TV episode or $60,000 per film. Studios would pay once to scan the likenesses of these performers without paying for their use or re-use — essentially giving them eternal rights to their face after paying once upfront. It appeared to offer limitless use of dead performers' AI-created likenesses without proper permission.

After this part of the dispute became public, the union reportedly “reached a common understanding” with AMPTP on “thorny issues” like AI consent after an actor dies.

— Mat Smith

Things go from bad to worse for Cruise's robotaxis

The company reportedly kept operating its robotaxis despite issues recognizing children.

GM's autonomous vehicle Cruise division is already going through a rough patch, with the California Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) recently suspending its driverless permits over safety issues. Now, several new reports highlight other issues, including problems with its autonomous vehicles' (AVs) sensors' recognizing children and the frequency with which human operators must remotely take control. The cars apparently also struggle to identify large holes too. Now, it appears Cruise has halted production of its Origin autonomous vehicle after the California DMV pulled its license. A GM spokesperson confirmed to Engadget that the company is “finishing production on a small number of pre-commercial vehicles and after that, plan[s] to temporarily pause production.”

Zelda, Mario and Pikmin give Nintendo a boost as console sales dwindle

Selling almost 20 million copies of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.

As the Nintendo Switch nears the end of its time, digital game sales are helping the company continue to perform well. From March to September 2023, Nintendo reported selling 19.5 million copies of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom , which was released in May. It also sold 2.61 million units of Pikmin 4 after it came out in July, and Mario Kart 8 Deluxe gained 3.22 million more sales. The racing game has now sold 57 million copies. Nintendo is expected to release its new flagship console sometime next year.

The Sony A9 III is the fastest full-frame camera ever

It's been a while since Sony updated its epic A9 series.

Sony's latest pro-oriented mirrorless camera was four years in the making. The Alpha A9 III is the first full-frame camera on the market with a global stacked sensor, a sort of holy grail in the photographic world. It allows for some wild specs, like 120 fps shooting speeds with no blackout, up to a 1/80,000th of a second shutter speed and zero rolling shutter. The global shutter also allows for shutter speeds of 1/80,000th of a second (1/16,000th during continuous shooting), ten times faster than most cameras. Ten times! The Alpha A9 III goes on pre-order tomorrow for $6,000, with a vertical grip available for $400 — but won't arrive until spring.

(AP Photo/Chris Pizzello)Hollywood Strikes A PS5 early Black Friday deal brings PlayStation DualSense controllers down to $50 each

The PlayStation Store at Amazon is selling various colors of the Playstation DualSense Wireless Controller for only $50 as part of its early Black Friday deals. You can get the controller for your PS5 , which also works for PCs, right now for up to 33 percent off their usual prices. Yes, the models on sale include the colors that typically go for $75 — Cosmic Red, Starlight Blue, Nova Pink, Galactic Purple, Gray Camouflage, Volcanic Red and Cobalt Blue — in addition to the basic $70 white and the Midnight Black controllers.

The DualSense controller has adaptive L2 and R2 triggers with varying levels of force and tension that change as you interact with your game's environment. It also comes with haptic feedback meant to add a layer of immersion to your gaming sessions. DualSense has a built-in microphone array, so you can chat with friends without a headset, though you can always plug one in through the controller's 3.5mm jack. And if you quickly want switch voice capture on or off, you can simply click the controller's dedicated mute button.

In case you've still yet to buy a PS5, or if you're looking to gift one these holidays, you can get one bundled with Marvel's Spider-Man 2 at a discount, as well. The bundle is selling for $500, down $60 from its regular price. We enjoyed Spider-Man 2 when we reviewed it and found it even better than the first installment. It was action-packed from the beginning, with a gameplay that allows you to quickly swap between Peter Parker and Miles Morales for two different types of Spidey-experiences. We also praised Insomniac for expanding and streamlining the game's combat mechanics. The game is exclusive to the PS5, and you'll get a full game voucher to download it from the PlayStation Network when you purchase this bundle.
